  "Allegations" : "IN AUGUST 1995, THE WITTENBERGS ATTENDED A FINANCIAL MONEY SHOW IN SAN FRANCISCO WHERE THEY MET ROBERT KENDRICK, A REGISTERED REP WITH OUR FIRM, AND GLEN JACKSON WHO WOULD LATER APPLY AS A REGISTERED REP WITH OUR FIRM.   "Broker Comment" : "AWARD WAS ASSESED AGAINST WJ GALLAGHER & COMPANY INC, GLENN JACKSON-REGISTERED REP, SIONE TANGON-SUPERVISOR, AND WILLIAM GALLIGHER-PRESIDENT OF THE FIRM. NONE OF THE PLAINTIFFS WERE CUSTOMERS OF THE FIRM. THEY INVESTED IN THE PRIVATE PLACEMENT AT THE \"MONEY SHOW\" IN SAN FRANCISCO IN 1995-1996.  THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS HAD EXPIRED. AWARD HAS BEEN APPEALED TO ARIZONA SUPERIOR COURT. THE JUDGE ASSIGNED TO THE CASE HAS ORDERED THE PARTIES TO FILE AND SERVE ON THE COURT AND COUNSEL THE FOLLOWING DOCUMENTS: A MOTION TO SET AND CERTIFICATE OF READINESS OR AN APPEAL FROM ARBITRATION AND MOTION TO SET ON OR BEFORE 5/8/01. THE MOTION SHALL INCLUDE AN ESTIMATE OF THE LENGTH OF TRIAL."
